search_results.query: How to go from New York to Montreal

snippet.title: Peanut Butter Ice Cream Pie - Hold on to Your Lips
snippet.description: This ice cream pie is so incredibly good. I can't even explain how wonderful it is. It's so easy to make too. Try it, you'll make it again...

snippet.title: New York Bialy, First Cousin to a Bagel
snippet.description: This is actually native to New York and is really a type of bagel. It's super good!
